actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit employers to withhold payroll taxes from the wages of employees who are paid on a weekly, biweekly, or semi-monthly basis from a single payment of wages each month.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow employers to withhold and pay the withholding tax on a monthly basis for employees who are paid more than once a month.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit employers to withhold payroll taxes from the wages of employees who are paid on a weekly, biweekly, or semi-monthly basis from a single payment of wages each month.
